article.title: SAIC Awarded $41 Million Delivery Order by the Army Evaluation Center
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a delivery order by the U.S. Army Evaluation Center to provide technical and business process support for planning, development and execution of Joint Improvised Explosive Device Defeat Test Board objectives. The delivery order has a total value of more than $41 million if all options are exercised.
